name: Making Peanut Butter-Flavored Cocktails with Peanut Punch
description: I was recently in Barbados for some diving where I encountered a Caribbean favorite: Peanut Punch. Now, this is nothing like the powdered drink mixes we grew up with as kids. Peanut Punch is a traditional island drink made of peanut butter, milk, honey/simply syrup, and spices. But that's the kiddie version; here are some suggestions for making cocktails with Peanut Punch.
recipeIngredient: 1/3 cup of honey or simple syrup

recipeInstructions.text: Put all of the ingredients a blender and mix on high speed until smooth. Serve chilled or over ice.
